segments.text: Could you tell me which kind of payment you'll choose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're going to pay by check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you please have the check certified ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you think it is necessary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's just our policy . We would accept a certified check or a direct bank remittance .
segments.speaker: S1
